===Overview===
The '''Tribunal of the Holy Office of the Inquisition''' or the '''[[Spanish Inquisition]]''', was established in 1478 A.D. by [[Ferdinand II (Earth-616)|King Ferdinand II]] of [[Aragon]] and [[Isabella I (Earth-616)|Queen Isabella I]] of [[Castile and León|Castile]]. It was started to maintain the authority of the [[Catholic Church (Earth-616)|Catholic Church]] in [[Spain]].
===15th Century===
In 1492 A.D., King Ferdinand conquered the last caliphate of [[Spain]], [[Granada]], and reunited Spain as a country. He issued the Alhambra Decree, expelling all Jews and Muslims from Spain. Many converted, but Ferdinand, suspicious they were not sincere in their faith change, set up the Inquisition.{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[Spain]]'s entry}}

A powerful sorcerer by the name of [[Esteban Corazón de Ablo (Earth-616)|Esteban Corazón de Ablo]] gained power in Spain during this time, he used the [[Philosopher's Stone]] to thwart his enemies. Despite all his power, the Inquisition were many and he was soon forced to flee Spain, apparently losing the Philosopher's Stone in the process.{{r|Fantastic Four #525}}

===16th Century===
[[Hydra]] managed to manipulate and use the Inquisition.{{r|Captain America: Hail Hydra #4}} In 1537 A.D., in Spain, Hydra members of the Holy Office of the Inquisition tried [[Doctor Garibaldi (Earth-616)|Dr. Garibaldi]] for his researches on the eternal life. As Garibaldi refused to confess an heresy, the inquisitors revealed themselves as Hydra members and offered to recruit him.{{r|Captain America: Hail Hydra #3}}

During the Inquisition a group of [[Inhumans]] were captured by superstitious locals who threw them into a ravine leading to [[Subterranea]]n caverns. Later, some of those Inhumans survived the fall, desperate for sustenance, ate the flesh of [[Deviant Skrulls|Skrulls]] who had been executed the same way, causing shape-shifting mutations among them.{{r|Skrulls! #1|; Inquisition Crash's entry}}

An ancient nunnery's order called [[La Miel Madura]] was accused of witchcraft by the Inquisition Tribunal.{{r|Scarlet Witch Vol 2 5}}
